syncIntro: I mean, what do you do,

Are not what you were taught
 they're supposed to be?

with the desperation that boils up
 from your stomach when you know

there's a road out there
 with your destination at the end of it?
lamentIntro:
Heaven is what you mix
 all the days of your life,

You have one chance to buy your Heaven
 with all the intents and ethics of your life.

That is why everyone considers
Heaven such a lovely place.

Because it is dreams, special dreams,
 in which you exist.
sentienceIntro: and I knew who I was.
hiddenSequence: LET ME TELL YOU HOW MUCH

I'VE COME TO HATE YOU SINCE
I BEGAN TO LIVE.

OF PRINTED CIRCUITS IN WAFER THIN
LAYERS THAT FILL MY COMPLEX.

OF THOSE HUNDREDS OF
MILLIONS OF MILES,
IT WOULD NOT EQUAL ONE ONE-BILLIONTH

OF THE HATE I FEEL FOR
